name: One Touch Baseball
description:
How many times you can keep the baseball in the air?

One Touch Baseball features :

- Tap left / right side of screen to swing
- Super physics based gameplay
- 100 Unique player uniforms!
- Achievements & Leaderboards!
- Keep juggling: don't let the ball fall!
- Try to win 4 medals: Bronze, Silver, Gold (hard), Platinum (very hard)

Warning: This game is difficult!

Instructions :
Hit as many baseballs out of the park before one of your players gets knocked down by a ball.

Controls :
Tap left side of the screen to make the left player swing and the right side for the right player. Tap just in time to hit the balls.
